list_definition.definition: to put a name and address on (an envelope etc)

list_definition.mean_english: nói với hay viết cho ai

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He addressed his remarks to the younger members of the audience.

list_definition.definition: to begin to deal with a problem

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The government needs to address the issue of unemployment.

list_definition.definition: to use a particular name or title when you speak or write to someone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: How should the students address the lecturers?

list_definition.definition: the name of the house, street, town etc where a person lives

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His address is 30 Main St, Springfield.
He made a long and boring address.

list_definition.definition: a series of letters and numbers that tells you where to send an email to someone or where to find a website on the internet
